Summarize a gantt object

Source: R/gantt.R
summary-gantt-method.Rd

Summarizes a gantt object.

Usage

# S4 method for gantt
summary(object, ...)

Arguments

object

A gantt object.

...

ignored.

Details

Prints a summary of a gantt dataset.

References

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burndown_chart

See also

Other things related to gantt data: as.gantt(), gantt-class, ganttAddTask(), gantt, plot,gantt-method, read.gantt()

Author

Dan Kelley

Examples

library(plan)
data(gantt)
summary(gantt)
#> Key, Description,            Start,      End,        Done, NeededBy
#>   1, Assemble equipment,     2008-01-01 04:00:00, 2008-03-28 03:00:00,   90
#>   2, Test methods,           2008-02-28 04:00:00, 2008-03-28 03:00:00,   30
#>   3, Field sampling,         2008-04-01 03:00:00, 2008-08-14 03:00:00,    0
#>   4, Analyse field data,     2008-06-30 03:00:00, 2008-11-14 04:00:00,    0
#>   5, Write methods chapter,  2008-08-14 03:00:00, 2008-11-14 04:00:00,    0
#>   6, Write results chapter,  2008-10-14 03:00:00, 2009-01-15 04:00:00,    0
#>   7, Write other chapters,   2008-12-10 04:00:00, 2009-02-28 04:00:00,    0
#>   8, Committee reads thesis, 2009-02-28 04:00:00, 2009-03-14 03:00:00,    0
#>   9, Revise thesis,          2009-03-15 03:00:00, 2009-03-30 03:00:00,    0
#>  10, Thesis on display,      2009-04-01 03:00:00, 2009-04-15 03:00:00,    0
#>  11, Defend thesis,          2009-04-16 03:00:00, 2009-04-17 03:00:00,    0
#>  12, Finalize thesis,        2009-04-18 03:00:00, 2009-05-07 03:00:00,    0
